Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Sap Sipper 7 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
10 Grass Pelt 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
25 Leaf Guard 4 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
40 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
55 Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
70 Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
85 Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
100 Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 17 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 20 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Chlorolize 8 Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Chlorophyll 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 7 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Fluffy 6 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Grass Pelt 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
Harvest 7 May create another Berry after one is used.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Leaf Guard 4 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
Natural Cure 7 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Overcoat 7 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Overgrow 5 Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Regenerator 8 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sap Sipper 7 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
Serene Grace 9 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Solar Power 4 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight or Solar Wind, but HP decreases every turn.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
